title: 流动水和流动岩浆怎么设置不让它流动
author: woner
txt_content: 表示在服务器里怂卡着，难受

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
plugins\Essentials\config.yml, 文本编辑器打开，可以找到以下设置，false改为true就行了# General physics/behavior modifications
  prevent:
    lava-flow: false
    water-flow: false复制代码

replies.author: qw5125123
replies.txt_content: 蛤蟆吃服务器 谁来玩呀 群号198438182
